categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Stormtroopers of the Empire of the Hand

nodes.text: Choral was a stormtrooper of Unit Aurek-Four of the Aurek Company in the 501st Legion of the Empire of the Hand.
Choral participated in the final assault against "the Warlord" on Kariek. He commented that the fortress of the Warlord "looks like something out of a bad legend".
